note: I was once an air circus performer but that was after I fought a war in the jungle and before I met Elvis. I've been married for 50+ years. I have crossed the Pacific Ocean 12 times, the Atlantic Ocean 28 times, the Sahara desert twice, Amazon rainforest six times and the equator at least 10 times. I've got an eagle on a par 4, three hole-in-one's, (the last with my grandson looking on) and Iâ€™ve driven a golf ball from the northern hemisphere into the southern hemisphere more than once.
